verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:22
verses.text: But he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, as did Manasseh his father: for Amon sacrificed unto all the carved images which Manasseh his father had made, and served them;

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:23
verses.text: And humbled not himself before the Lord, as Manasseh his father had humbled himself; but Amon trespassed more and more.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:24
verses.text: And his servants conspired against him, and slew him in his own house.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:25
verses.text: But the people of the land slew all them that had conspired against king Amon; and the people of the land made Josiah his son king in his stead.
